Take:         [0, 1, 2]
Source:
+----------+----------+----------+----------+----------+
| Column 0 | Column 1 | Column 2 | Column 3 | Column 4 |
+----------+----------+----------+----------+----------+
| 1_i32    | 2_i32    | 1_f32    | 4_i32    | "x1"     |
| 2_i32    | 2_i32    | 2_f32    | 4_i32    | "x2"     |
| 3_i32    | 2_i32    | 3_f32    | 4_i32    | "x3"     |
+----------+----------+----------+----------+----------+
Result:
+----------+----------+----------+----------+----------+
| Column 0 | Column 1 | Column 2 | Column 3 | Column 4 |
+----------+----------+----------+----------+----------+
| 1_i32    | 2_i32    | 1_f32    | 4_i32    | "x1"     |
| 2_i32    | 2_i32    | 2_f32    | 4_i32    | "x2"     |
| 3_i32    | 2_i32    | 3_f32    | 4_i32    | "x3"     |
